item.title: TMIP 2019 NCoV Recognition
item.description: We propose the use of Deep Neural Networks, as an initial experiment we used ChexNeXt Pneumonia Detection Model as the baseline architecture where we use transfer learning to detect pneumonia. Secondly we use three different convolutional neural network architectures (ResNet50, InceptionV3 and Inception-ResNetV2) for the detection of coronavirus pneumonia infected patients using chest X-ray radiographs.
